function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of quick and early detection of the disease","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases, leading to increased infections and potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implementation of quick and early disease detection technologies and processes, such as multi-mode sensors and integration with mobile apps.","Technologies":"Multi-mode sensors, disposable sensors, mobile app integration","People":"General population, healthcare workers, communities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technological companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Risk of contamination due to single-use sensors","Impact":"Potential spread of diseases if contaminated sensors are not properly disposed of.","Mitigation":"Promotion of proper disposal practices, development of easy-to-use and disposable sensors.","Technologies":"Disposable sensors, easy-to-use electrodes","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Sensor manufacturers, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate manufacturing capacity to meet sensor demand","Impact":"Inability to provide sufficient and accessible sensors to cover the total population and geographical areas, leading to gaps in disease monitoring and control.","Mitigation":"Utilization of 3D printing and machine molding to increase production levels, investment in low-cost and high availability sensor manufacturing.","Technologies":"3D printing, machine molding, advanced manufacturing techniques","People":"General population, healthcare organizations, manufacturing industries","Owner":"Manufacturing companies, government agencies"}]}
